about_desc: Creative, dedicated and always willing to learn. Hire me and I'll make the best pasta on the plate that you've eaten (or your money back).
pr_message_board_desc: Message board mimicking some of common social network features, such as: User registration and access, profile, posts, likes.
pr_weather_app_desc: Weather forecast application that makes use of the openWeather public API.
pr_virtual_assistant_desc: Customizable personal assistant with voice recognition and text-to-speech.
pr_focus_point_desc: "All in one" application bundled with tools for organization and time management. Mobile focused development.
pr_cool_rainbows_desc: One of my first codes pushed to github, made for learning and fun. Basically a color switcher in vanilla js.
name: Name
subject: Subject
landing1: My name is Leonel, I'm passionate about tech and always looking for something new to learn.
landing2: I work as a full-stack dev for a few years now and during this time I had the opportunity to work with a lot of tech and languages.
landing3: Currently, I’m aiming to specialize in cybersecurity. I’m undergoing training at
landing4: getting familiar with techniques and tools used in vulnerability exploitation, as well as mitigation and prevention. I’m seeking an opportunity to enter the field.
landing5: As a programmer, I apply the knowledge I’ve acquired to build more secure and resilient applications.
landing6: Going a little further, I am a proud father and, in my free time: artist, tattoo artist, writer wannabe, gamer, gamedev, among other things.
landing7: Feel free to get in touch with me
tech0: In my four years of experience, I’ve worked with various languages and technologies, actively contributing to the development of solutions.
tech1: Front-end experience with React and advanced state management using Redux and Hooks.
tech2: Solid back-end experience using Laravel, Python (Flask and Django), and NodeJS.
tech3: API and RESTful API development. Also experienced with integrations, such as with the Getnet Gateway.
tech4: Database modeling and work with relational databases like MySQL and PostgreSQL and ORMs. I’ve also worked with MongoDB.
tech5: Adoption of best practices in development, version control, and security: SOLID, TDD, Gitflow, OWASP, NIST SSDF.
tech6: Experience with infrastructure solutions and concepts, including Docker, NGINX, Google Cloud Platform, and CI/CD pipelines.
tech7: Knowledge and experience with GNU/Linux environments and Bash.
tech8: Agile methodologies such as Scrum and understanding of the software development lifecycle.
tech9: Almost or just as important, I am a creative and dedicated person with a hunger for knowledge, always willing and seeking to learn new things.
desc_fmu:
●​ Developed a platform for teachers experience and management, using Next.JS and Node.JS. Also integrating with Microsoft EntraID using OAuth2.
●​ Actively contributed to the planning and development of students re-enrollment also using the Javascript ecosystem. Where I've also identified and fixed a critical business logic flaw.
●​ Integrated with Getnet payment gateway and monitored error and fraud logs.
●​ Configured production environments and performed deployments on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
desc_health:
●​ We were the first Healthtech to implement the Anywhere Lab tests business model in Brazil.
●​ Developed a platform for a large health insurance company, that put the beneficiaries on a coordinated care based on their needs, using predictive analysis and calculated health risks. Using Laravel on a docker environment and React on the front-end. We've also adopted GraphQL in order to reduce server workload and improve efficiency.
●​ Kickstarted a governance platform using our main stack: Laravel, React and GraphQL. I've also implemented JWT authentication, file upload and storage on Amazon S3.
●​ Implemented multiple improvements and bug fixes in Expermed’s insurance platform. For example, the creation of SQL queries for new report types that were exported to PDF.
●​ Developed a health education platform aimed at teachers and education professionals.
●​ Prototyped UI/UX solutions in Figma with a focus on intuitive and user-centered design.
desc_wisedata:
●​ Planning and development of systems from scratch for the most diverse segments.
●​ Currently building an NPS system that integrates multiple communication channels, leveraging RabbitMQ for efficient queue management.
desc_happy: ● Creation of materials and preparation of programming classes focused on games, taught to children and teenagers.
desc_art: ● Seeking to understand my clients’ needs, I applied my knowledge creatively, aiming for innovative and high-quality deliveries.
desc_expo_art: Exhibition of some of my paintings in different bars and studios in my city.
desc_thm_path: CTFs are practical challenges where various cybersecurity techniques must be employed to capture a "flag". Learning Paths are learning tracks composed of lessons and supporting materials.
desc_fiap_cybersec: This FIAP course covers the pillars of cybersecurity and its application to protect systems. Topics include encryption, vulnerability analysis, social engineering, and frameworks for intrusion testing.
desc_google_cybersec: This certification is made up of eight courses, which cover various topics, such as: essential cybersecurity concepts; frameworks and best practices, CISSP, NIST CSF, OWASP; Threat detection, SIEM and SOAR tools; responding to security incidents; identifying vulnerabilities; hardening; automating tasks and analyzing data with Python and MySQL; GNU/Linux environments.
